stripped_text: Subroutine Trace[5]. If successful, the Runner reveals the grip. Trash each card revealed this way with a play or install cost of X or less. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
text: [subroutine] Trace[5]. If successful, the Runner reveals the grip. Trash each card revealed this way with a play or install cost of X or less. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
title: Waiver
